03 A A Video Days of the Week Song.mp4.question: What are the days of the week?
03 A A Video Days of the Week Song.mp4.answer: Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday, Thursday, Friday, Saturday, Sunday

03 B A Today Yesterday Tomorrow.jpg.question: What day is today/yesterday/tomorrow?
03 B A Today Yesterday Tomorrow.jpg.answer: Today is (day), yesterday was (day), tomorrow will be (day)

04 A A Family Members.jpg.question: Who is in your family?
04 A A Family Members.jpg.answer: In my family there is my mother, father, sister, brother, etc.

04 B A Is This Your Mother.jpg.filename: 04 B A Is This Your Mother.jpg

04 B A Is This Your Mother.jpg.answer: Yes, she is my mother / No, she is not my mother

05 B A Weather and Clothes.jpg.question: What do you wear when it's cold?
05 B A Weather and Clothes.jpg.answer: I wear a coat, scarf, hat, and gloves when it's cold
